Footer.description: Leading Saudi AI solutions provider, delivering secure and compliant artificial intelligence for enterprises.
Footer.save: Marahel Digital Company. All rights reserved.

Hero.p1: Secure, compliant, and powerful AI solutions built for Saudi enterprises.
Hero.p2: Keep your data sovereign while unlocking the full potential of artificial intelligence.

Products.title: Comprehensive AI Solutions for Every Business Need
Products.p: From intelligent chatbots to advanced document processing, our AI products are designed to transform your business operations
Products.description1: Advanced knowledge media understanding, search, summarisation, and translation
Products.description2: Intelligent enterprise chatbot for customer support and internal helpdesk
Products.description3: Indoor navigation, Smart agenda builder app

Challenges.title: Why Choose Local AI Hosting?
Challenges.p: Experience the advantages of keeping your AI infrastructure within Saudi Arabia
Challenges.description1: Your data, your domain. Complete ownership and control over your information.
Challenges.global1: Data stored in foreign jurisdictions with limited control.
Challenges.description2: Near-zero latency with local processing in KSA data centres.
Challenges.global2: Higher latency due to distance to global regions.
Challenges.description3: Pre-built for PDPL and NCA ECC compliance from day one.
Challenges.global3: DIY compliance with complex regulatory requirements.

Trust.title: Trusted by Leading Saudi Organisations
Trust.p: Join the growing number of enterprises that trust Marahel for their AI transformation
Trust.description1: Full compliance with Saudi data protection laws

Cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business with Local AI?
Cta.p: Join leading Saudi organisations already benefiting from secure, compliant AI solutions.

Events.title: My Companion - Your Guide at the Event

Documents.p: According to company policy, employees are entitled to 30 days of paid annual leave...

Message.content2: Hello! Working hours are from Sunday to Thursday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
Message.content4: Of course! I can help you book an appointment. What is your preferred date?

knowledgehub.title: AI Interactive Knowledge Hub
knowledgehub.description: The single gateway to store, index, search, and use all enterprise knowledge—documents, audio, video, and images—with instant “Ask Your Archive” answers and Arabic‑first multilingual support.

featuresDesc.f1: Eliminate fragmentation: one place to store, index, and share every asset type.
featuresDesc.f2: Built for Arabic + multi‑language processing across content and chat experiences.
featuresDesc.f3: Meaning‑based search with concise answers and smart related suggestions.

features2.f1: Supports documents, audio, video, and images
features2.f3: Real‑time processing of media and transcripts
features2.f4: Meaning‑based, context‑aware search across all content
features2.f5: “Ask Your Archive” for instant Q&A with citations
features2.f6: Audio‑visual search that jumps to exact moments in media
features2.f10: Built on our Document Understanding & Search engines

items.i1: PDPL: data minimization, access rights, DPIA where required
items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: fairness, reliability/safety, transparency
items.i3: NCA‑ECC: RBAC, logging, incident response baselines

items.i2: Encryption in transit & at rest; precise permissions

knowledgehub.footerText: Arabic‑ready today. Built for Saudi enterprises.

morshed.title: Morshed — Intelligent Chat Assistant
morshed.description: Always-on support via WhatsApp, Telegram, and Web. Fast, accurate answers with seamless handoff to human agents — Arabic & English ready.

featuresDesc.f1: Reduce wait time with instant responses and high-quality answers
featuresDesc.f2: Seamless handoff to agents when needed
featuresDesc.f3: Security by design and compliant with Saudi regulations

features2.f6: Agent handoff & conversation log to ticketing system

items.i1: PDPL: data minimization, user rights, secure handling
items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: fairness, safety, transparency
Encryption in transit & at rest; least privilege

morshed.footerText: Morshed learns, escalates, and resolves—securely and bilingual.

rafiki.title: Rafiki — Event & Exhibition Concierge
rafiki.description: Bilingual AR/EN concierge plans your day, guides indoor navigation, translates booth info, and captures leads — powered by Marahel AINE & real-time analytics.

featuresDesc.f1: Step-by-step indoor routing with smart pathing to reduce congestion
featuresDesc.f2: Build personal schedule from sessions, booths, key meetings
featuresDesc.f3: AR/EN chat, booth summaries, instant translations

features2.f2: Smart schedule builder; conflict detection & alerts
features2.f3: Lead capture: QR scan, notes, photos; CRM export
features2.f7: Notifications: session changes, offers, traffic alerts
features2.f8: Offline map caching; reliable on-site performance
features2.f9: Exhibitor dashboard: staff tasks, leads, follow-ups

items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: fairness, safety, transparency for recommendations
items.i3: NCA‑ECC controls: RBAC, logging, incident response

items.i1: Hosted in KSA with data sovereignty options
items.i2: Encryption in transit & at rest; least privilege

LLMS.title: LLMs Evaluation & Optimization (Executive‑Grade)
LLMS.description: A rigorous, board‑ready program to measure quality, safety, latency, and cost—and to tune prompts, RAG, and SLMs for Saudi enterprises.

featuresDesc.f1: Executive scorecards connecting quality, cost, and risk to business KPIs.
featuresDesc.f2: Prompt, RAG, and SLM tuning with measurable QoQ improvements.
featuresDesc.f3: Controls mapped to PDPL, SDAIA AI Ethics, NCA‑ECC, NIST AI RMF, ISO/IEC 42001.

method.f1: Define KPIs, use cases, harms, and constraints.
method.f2: Dataset curation, golden sets, telemetry & tracing.
method.f3: Run RAGAS/DeepEval; record P50/P95 latency & cost.
method.f4: Prompts, tools, retrieval, and SLM selection/fine‑tuning.
method.f5: Jailbreak tests, redaction, PDPL checks, HITL gates.
method.f6: Executive pack and backlog with owners & ROI.

w3.text: Optimization backlog: prompts, retrieval, tools, SLMs

w4.text: Risk register aligned to PDPL & SDAIA Ethics

w5.text: Observed KPI uplifts and ROI model

w6.text: Playbooks for regression tests and A/B evaluation

items.i1: PDPL: lawful basis, minimization, retention, and subject rights evidence
items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: fairness, transparency, reliability/safety testing
items.i3: NCA‑ECC: RBAC, logging, vulnerability management baselines

items.i1: NIST AI RMF: govern‑map‑measure‑manage lifecycle with risk scoring
items.i2: ISO/IEC 42001: AI management system evidence pack
items.i3: Secure‑by‑design: red‑teaming, jailbreak tests, DLP and PII redaction

LLMS.footerText: From evaluation to sustained optimization—Arabic‑ready and compliant by design.

Readiness.title: Assessment for AI Transformation Readiness
Readiness.description: Standards-anchored scan across governance, people, data, tech, security, and ethics—benchmarked to NIST AI RMF 1.0, ISO/IEC 42001, and KSA requirements (PDPL, SDAIA AI Ethics, NCA‑ECC). Arabic/English ready.

featuresDesc.f1: Board-ready visibility of capability gaps, risks, and ROI-aligned priorities.
featuresDesc.f2: Evidence against NIST AI RMF 1.0, ISO/IEC 42001, and KSA (PDPL/SDAIA/NCA‑ECC).
featuresDesc.f3: Sequenced quick-wins plus a 12‑month roadmap to move fast safely.

method.f2: Scorecard; RMF/ISO mapping; draft policy pack
method.f3: Approve roadmap; quick‑win fixes; exec sign‑off

w2.text: Policy Pack: AI policy, RACI, escalation runbooks, DPIA & transparency artifacts

w3.text: 90‑Day and 12‑Month Roadmap with costed actions and success criteria

w4.text: Risk register aligned to PDPL/ECC with owners and due dates

w6.text: Templates: DPIA, transparency cards (Model Cards, Datasheets)

items.i1: PDPL: lawful basis, minimization, data‑subject rights, cross‑border controls
items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: fairness, reliability/safety, transparency & explainability
items.i3: NCA‑ECC: RBAC, logging, incident response baselines

items.i2: ISO/IEC 42001: AI management system evidence pack
items.i3: Transparency Artifacts: Model Cards, Datasheets, System Cards

Readiness.footerText: Get a board-ready baseline and a practical roadmap—grounded in PDPL, SDAIA AI Ethics, NCA‑ECC, NIST AI RMF, and ISO/IEC 42001.

Roadmap.title: استراتيجية وخارطة الطريق لتحول الذكاء الاصطناعي
Roadmap.description: برنامج يركز على الأعمال ومرتكز على المعايير يترجم أهدافك إلى خارطة طريق للذكاء الاصطناعي موزعة زمنياً—متوافقة مع NIST AI RMF 1.0، ISO/IEC 42001، ومتطلبات المملكة (PDPL، SDAIA AI Ethics، NCA‑ECC). ثنائي اللغة بشكل افتراضي.

featuresDesc.f1: رؤية جاهزة للمجلس لفجوات القدرات والمخاطر والأولويات المرتبطة بالعائد.
featuresDesc.f2: أدلة مطابقة لـ NIST AI RMF 1.0، ISO/IEC 42001، ومتطلبات المملكة (PDPL/SDAIA/NCA‑ECC).
featuresDesc.f3: سلسلة من النجاحات السريعة وخارطة طريق لمدة 12 شهرًا للتحرك بسرعة وبأمان.

method.f1: المواءمة والاكتشاف — ورش عمل استراتيجية، مسح الوضع الحالي، تحديد نطاق PDPL/ECC، مؤشرات الأداء
method.f2: التقييم والخط الأساس — تقييم الجاهزية، مطابقة بنود ISO/IEC 42001، إعداد مسودة السياسات
method.f3: أولوية الحافظة — حالات الأعمال، الاعتماديات، موافقة التنفيذيين
method.f4: العمارة المرجعية — رؤية شمالية، مصفوفة الضوابط
method.f5: الحوكمة والمخاطر — مجلس الذكاء الاصطناعي/RACI، نماذج DPIA، ضوابط الأخلاقيات
method.f6: تشكيل التجارب التجريبية — اختيار تجارب سريعة قابلة للقياس؛ قرار التنفيذ

w1.text: العمارة المرجعية للذكاء الاصطناعي (منطقية وفعليّة)، خريطة التكامل، مصفوفة الضوابط الأمنية/البيانات

w2.text: حافظة حالات الاستخدام ذات الأولوية مع حالات الأعمال، مؤشرات الأداء، تقييم المخاطر

w3.text: حزمة السياسات والحوكمة: سياسة الذكاء الاصطناعي، سجل المخاطر، أدلة التصعيد، مطابقة RMF، نماذج DPIA، وثائق الشفافية

w4.text: مخطط التقييم والمراقبة؛ خارطة طريق 12 شهر مع معالم مجدولة

items.i1: PDPL: الأساس القانوني، التقليل، الاحتفاظ، والتحكم عبر الحدود
items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: العدالة، الموثوقية/الأمان، الشفافية والقابلية للشرح
items.i3: NCA‑ECC: التحكم في الوصول، التسجيل، ومعايير استجابة للحوادث

items.i1: NIST AI RMF 1.0: دورة الحياة Govern/Map/Measure/Manage
items.i2: ISO/IEC 42001: حزمة دليل نظام إدارة الذكاء الاصطناعي
items.i3: وثائق الشفافية: بطاقات النماذج، جداول البيانات، بطاقات النظام

Roadmap.footerText: اجعل قيمة الذكاء الاصطناعي قابلة للقياس—اربط حالات الاستخدام بمؤشرات الأداء، والامتثال بالوثائق، والتنفيذ بخطة 12 شهرًا.

Platform.title: منصات الذكاء الاصطناعي (مستضافة محليًا / نماذج محلية)
Platform.description: منصات ذكاء اصطناعي ذات سيادة داخل المملكة للـ RAG، الوكلاء والتحليلات—نشر محلي أو سحابة خاصة مع نماذج LLM/SLM محلية، رؤية كاملة، وضوابط حماية. ثنائية اللغة افتراضيًا.

featuresDesc.f1: جميع البيانات والنماذج والسجلات تبقى داخل المملكة مع حوكمة متوافقة مع PDPL.
featuresDesc.f2: اختيار حجم SLMs وGPU المناسب؛ التخزين المؤقت والمعالجة لتقليل التأخير والتكلفة.
featuresDesc.f3: التتبع، التقييم، وFinOps توضح الأداء من المطالبة حتى الإنتاج.

method.f2: قاعدة بيانات متجهية • BM25 • التخزين المؤقت

w4.text: أدلة التشغيل: عمليات، النسخ الاحتياطي/DR، استجابة للحوادث

w6.text: حزمة الأدلة الأمنية وPDPL ووثائق الشفافية

items.i1: PDPL: الأساس القانوني، التقليل، الاحتفاظ، والتحكم عبر الحدود
items.i2: SDAIA AI Ethics: العدالة، الموثوقية/الأمان، الشفافية والقابلية للشرح
items.i3: NCA‑ECC: التحكم في الوصول، التسجيل، تقسيم الشبكة، استجابة للحوادث

items.i1: NIST AI RMF 1.0: دورة الحياة Govern/Map/Measure/Manage مع المخاطر والضوابط
items.i2: ISO/IEC 42001: حزمة دليل نظام إدارة الذكاء الاصطناعي (سياسات، إجراءات، سجلات)
items.i3: تصميم آمن: DLP، إزالة بيانات التعريف الشخصية، إدارة الأسرار، أمان سلسلة التوريد

Platform.footerTitle: امتلك منصة الذكاء الاصطناعي الخاصة بك—داخل المملكة
Platform.footerText: نشر ذكاء اصطناعي ذو سيادة مع نماذج محلية وحوكمة موثوقة وأداء قابل للقياس.

Strategy.title: AI Strategy Consulting
Strategy.description: Navigate your AI transformation journey with confidence. Our expert consultants help Saudi enterprises develop comprehensive AI strategies, identify high-impact use cases, and build roadmaps for successful implementation while ensuring compliance with local regulations.

featuresDesc.f1: Comprehensive evaluation of your organization's AI readiness, data maturity, and technology infrastructure.
featuresDesc.f2: Identify and prioritize high-value AI use cases aligned with your business objectives and ROI targets.
featuresDesc.f3: Detailed financial modeling and business case development for AI investments with clear success metrics.
featuresDesc.f4: Organizational change strategies to ensure successful AI adoption and employee engagement.
featuresDesc.f5: AI risk assessment, ethical AI frameworks, and compliance with Saudi regulations and PDPL.
featuresDesc.f6: KPI frameworks and monitoring systems to track AI initiative success and continuous improvement.
